ComicInfo.Title: Patriot and Super Patriot
ComicInfo.Summary: Patriot and Super Patriot: When Glory begins investigating secret government agencies currently involved in raising the dead as super soldiers, she is attacked by an enemy she hasn't faced since World War II.
